alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 03 at 3:27AM MDT until November 04 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may hold off until Thursday evening before beginning in earnest.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
